name: Cyberpunk Edgerunners (Studio Trigger) Style LoRA
description:
Cyberpunk Edgerunners (Studio Trigger) style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

One of the best shows of last year and the amazing anime style of Studio Trigger. I just had to make it.

The tests I made are from my AnyLoRA model, but should work on most style neutral anime LoRA based on the Anything/AOM family.

Trigger is cyberpunk edgerunners and weight should be around 1.

While it can do some Cyberpunk characters from their descriptions, please remember this is a style LoRA, so it requires other loras/embeddings to be accurate. See this to get what I mean.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
